name: ASUS ROG Strix RTX 4090 OC
description: The ASUS ROG Strix GeForce RTX 4090 brings a whole new meaning to going with the flow. Inside and out, every element of the card gives the monstrous GPU room to breathe freely and achieve ultimate performance.

name: AMD Ryzen 9 7950X3D
description: The ultimate gaming processor, featuring AMD 3D V-Cache technology for massive gaming performance. This 16-core processor can do it all for the most demanding gamers and creators.

name: ASUS ROG Maximus Z790 Hero
description: The ASUS ROG Maximus Z790 Hero is a powerhouse motherboard designed for enthusiasts, featuring robust power delivery and advanced cooling options.

name: Corsair Vengeance RGB 32GB DDR5
description: CORSAIR VENGEANCE RGB DDR5 memory delivers performance and style, with dynamic RGB lighting and high-frequency performance optimized for Intel and AMD systems.

name: Samsung 990 Pro 2TB
description: Experience the ultimate SSD performance. The 990 Pro delivers near-maximum speeds of PCIe 4.0 for high-end gaming and creative workloads.

name: Corsair RM1000x 1000W
description: Corsair RMx series power supplies provide high-quality components for 80 PLUS Gold efficient power and low noise operation.

name: Lian Li PC-O11 Dynamic EVO
specs: Mid Tower • Dual Chamber • Tempered Glass
description: The O11 Dynamic EVO is the evolution of the classic O11D, featuring a reversible design and improved airflow for the ultimate build aesthetic.

name: NZXT Kraken Elite 360 RGB
description: The Kraken Elite delivers chilling performance with a high-resolution LCD display to show off your system's stats or your favorite GIFs.
